website_summaries.verdict: This stick offers pro-level build and performance, and though it's pricey, it's a good choice for youths who are serious about the game.
pros: Lightweight, durable, and easy to maneuver thanks to the 3K Carbon Dual-Core craftsmanship
Has earned praise for how well it shoots
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum, but if you want a top-quality stick you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: The Raven Delivers for Youth Hockey Players!
customer_reviews.text: Love this 30 flex Raven hockey stick for my mite-aged son. His first Raven lasted about 3 months before it got snapped in a vicious corner puck battle (stick got caught in a gap in the boards--not the Raven's fault that it snapped!). My son loved the stick, and so we rushed to buy him a replacement. It's nice to have a pro-grade stick that is sized appropriately for younger players. Go-T Hockey did a great job of quickly shipping us the product. Well-packaged and arrived as anticipated. Just put a nice Buttendz grip on this stick and my son should be ready for practice tomorrow night.
customer_reviews.author: John Hermanek

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the weight and feel in his hands
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves this stick. He put a thick sock over the blade and practice shooting with this stick in the house. He loves the weight and feel. Not very many 30 or 40 flex out there. My son is ten, very tall and very skinny nearly five feet tall and just barely 70lbs. He needs a 30 flex unfortunately this stick was to short and we had to return it for the 40 flex. We had no problem with returning it and had our new 40 flex stick a week later and it is now his new best friend. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: C.Van

customer_reviews.title: Nice twig
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough one. My son loves the stick and the flex is great. I feel it’s a bit delicate though. He snapped the first one in 100 days. I bought another because he loves it so much. The second one is chipping a bit on the blade heal. It could be because he’s a bonehead and hits the ice for a pass too hard but still. It won’t deter though, I will buy him the next size up when he is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product shoots and scores!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this stick. He has always used the big hockey brands and the day that he switched his stickhandling and shooting improved. He is a defenseman and usually only scores every couple of games. The first game he scored five goals and two assists. He loves that the curve was Patrick Kane as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stick for our Youth Hockey Player
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Raven's youth hockey sticks for over a year. The Raven is the perfect fit for our 8 year old and has the correct amount of flex. We no longer cut sticks to fit which increased the flex so he could not use them properly. His shot and stick handling has improved due to the youth flex and height with the Jr. sized blade. The stick warranty and customer service has also been outstanding! Thank you for designing a quality stick to fit todays youth hockey player!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not easy to find youth sticks that fit his size
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using a CCM stick for years and we're excited to get our first Raven. It's not easy to find youth sticks that fit his size. He tried out this stick in practice as a few of his team members have it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Great stick! Quick service!
customer_reviews.text: Great stick! Kid loves it! Hopefully it will last til his next season!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great stick for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second Raven stick, he loves it! Has a really soft hands feel to it, he has tried the CCM with same curve, pucks bounce off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gandrud

customer_reviews.title: Stick is super light, of excellent quality and feels good in ...
customer_reviews.text: Stick is super light, of excellent quality and feels good in your hands. Looked at the sizing chart and it fit my son perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sayler

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the stick and my son is very happy with it. Used a few times already and love it better than his Bauer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stick, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these sticks, it helped him elevate the puck over the goalie to score more goals! Barry with Go-T hockey was very helpful and knowledgeable in answering all my questions. Will definitely buy through Barry again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Raven Junior Ice Hockey Stick 30 Flex
product_meta.description: The FLEX30 by Raven Hockey is a Junior/Youth hybrid designed for players under 80 lbs and looking to control a hard pass on the rush while also being able to raise the puck top shelf. The most commanding feature of the FLEX30 is the low flex rating of 30, appropriate for the height and weight of most youth hockey players and the lowest in the industry.The FLEX30 is the perfect stick for players under 57" tall.Most youth sticks have a shaft too narrow to allow for correct puck control and cutting inches off a typical junior stick will increase the stiffness negatively affecting passing and shooting. The FLEX30 is the only stick in hockey with a flex low enough to correctly fit players who weigh less than 80 pounds. All this with a 60-day warranty.
feature_bullets: The FLEX30 is the perfect stick for players under 57" tall.
